scripts.build: pnpm --filter @agent-console/shared build && pnpm --filter @agent-console/client build && pnpm --filter @agent-console/server build
scripts.deploy:mac: pnpm build && mkdir -p ~/.agent-console/server && rsync -av --delete --exclude node_modules dist/ ~/.agent-console/server/ && cd ~/.agent-console/server && pnpm install --prod && launchctl unload ~/Library/LaunchAgents/com.agent-console.plist && launchctl load ~/Library/LaunchAgents/com.agent-console.plist && echo 'Deployed and restarted'
